reviews.review: A good game, I highly recommend it, the only drawback is cheaters, although there are fewer of them, they are there, and a toxic community, and the game is gorgeous!
Gra bardzo przyjenma, lecz na początku jest bardzo duzo cheaterów nawet z prime'em. Po nabiciu zaufania jest elegancja
Otimo jogo, pena que o sistema VAC é bem ruinzinho...
Ну игра нормальная, только тимейты это пиздец!!
Jogo legal, te deixa maluco as vezes, mas é legal
挺好玩的，就开始感觉不适应，蹲着准星高。
🧂this is yes big guns we like 🧂
作为一个老六，我非常喜欢这款游戏

No começo bem dificil, ja que as partidas casuais não tem um filtro de niveis entao você cai com players que jogam a muito tempo, porem esse jogo é pratica quanto mais pratica melhor, alem disso vale a pena comprar o prime as caixas que você ganha pode abrir e ganhar skins aleatorias ou vender a caixa(não vale a pena vender, melhor juntar e quando tiver money abri-las)
I hate this game. It gave me cancer and my parents left me. And there is too Many pedophiles trying too find me because im so sexy 🧔🏽‍♀️
硬核的枪战游戏，真心不错

Axyeннaя игра , ты узнаешь столько информации про себя и свою семью , что наверняка станешь дед инсайдом, хотя наверняка ты им уже являешься по скольку попадаются либо токсики , либо отбросы в тиме по типу Данила, а так игра норм , удачи проебать 1 к

excellent game difficult to learn in the beginning but once you get the hang of its easy watch videos of the game to get better and play with consistent team never solo que and practice on y-prac maps practice aim and spray patterns and have good croshair placement  and have fun
топовая игра , читеров очень мало , всем советую
Toxic guys kick me for 0 kills!
Good game, shitty community. Would still recommend.
лол... серьёзно играю так давно в кс, а обзор только щас пишу....это жоска
还可以但是新手进去一段时间会给虐的很惨
HS ONLY, SORRY, I NOT CHEATER!
Игра найс ,но играть надо с тимой ,а то попадаютя тупые рандомы
